mapper.select: select no,title,content,wdate,writer,imageUrl from blog_news order by no desc limit 3 offset #{page}
select no,title,content,writer,imageUrl from blog_news where no=#{no}
mapper.update: update blog_news set title=#{title},content=#{content},writer=#{writer},imageUrl=#{imageUrl} where no=#{no} and password=#{password}
mapper.delete: delete from blog_news where no=#{no} and password=#{password}
